paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on a TTR variant associated with familial amyloidotic polyneuropathy, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Studies were conducted on amyloid fibril protein (AFp) isolated from tissues of two Portuguese patients who died with familial amyloidosis.
Studies were conducted on amyloid fibril protein (AFp) isolated from tissues of two Portuguese patients who died with familial amyloidosis.

functional_data.summary: The variant TTR was present in the TTR isolated from the pooled sera of amyloidoses patients, along with larger amounts of normal TTR.
assays: comparative peptide mappings by reverse-phase high performance liquid chromatography (HPLC)

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in the studied patients.
variants.evidence_level: strong evidence based on functional studies and clinical correlation.
variants.additional_notes: The variant is associated with a specific biochemical cause of the disease.
key_quotes: the purified amyloid fibril protein comprised a TTR variant with a methionine-for-valine substitution at position 30.
the variant TTR represents the specific biochemical cause of the disease.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data extracted from the main text.
